title: Service Management - Managed Login Items (com.apple.servicemanagement)
description: This payload that configures managed login items, which auto-enables and auto-allows matched items.

items.title: Rule
items.description: A specification for matching one or more login items.

RuleType.title: Rule Type
RuleType.description: The type of comparison to make.

RuleValue.title: Rule Value
RuleValue.description: The value to compare with each login item's value, to determine if this rule is a match.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: An optional description of the rule.

TeamIdentifier.title: Team Identifier
TeamIdentifier.description: An additional constraint to limit the scope of the rule that the system tests after matching the 'RuleType' and 'RuleValue'.

Rules.title: Rules
Rules.description: An array of service management rules.
